thread.title: Punjab National Bank provides women special relaxation in vehicle loan rate
thread.title_full: Punjab National Bank provides women special relaxation in vehicle loan rate | The Financial Express

author: financialexpress.com
title: Punjab National Bank provides women special relaxation in vehicle loan rate
text:
Punjab National Bank (PNB) in Rajasthan has extended a special relaxation in vehicle loan interest rate to women, who are having house loan with the bank, till December 31, a Jaipur Circle Head said today.
The special relaxation in interest rate of 10 per cent against the existing 11.50 of general customer rate has been offered to women having housing loan with PNB, Jaipur Circle head and DGM Rakesh Shukla said here.
The special scheme began yesterday, and will continue till December 31, he said.
There will be no processing fee, and documentation charges to women applicants, he said, adding all processing fee were around Rs 6000.
Floating interest rate of vehicle loan is 10.25 per cent, he said.
 02, 2015 9:15 pm
